mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.g_code, g.g_name, g.specification, g.py_code, g.manufacturer, g.remark, g.bar_code, g.qr_code, g.type, g.model, g.weight, g.color, g.unit, g.purchase_price, g.sell_price, g.allocation, u.gu_name AS unitName, t.gt_name AS typeName, i.count FROM tb_goods_info g LEFT JOIN tb_goods_unit u ON u.id = g.unit LEFT JOIN tb_goods_type t ON t.id = g.type LEFT JOIN tb_wh_inventory i ON i.good_id = g.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT g.id, g.g_code, g.g_name, g.specification, g.py_code, g.manufacturer, g.remark, g.bar_code, g.qr_code, g.type, g.model, g.weight, g.color, g.unit, g.allocation, u.gu_name AS unitName, t.gt_name AS typeName, og.good_num, og.price as purchasePrice, og.total_price FROM tb_goods_info g LEFT JOIN tb_goods_unit u ON u.id = g.unit LEFT JOIN tb_goods_type t ON t.id = g.type LEFT JOIN tb_order_goods og ON og.good_id = g.id where og.order_id = #{id}
